promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word pokemon name for a gigantic rare wolf normal-type with a opal tail. It can be found in village-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or normal. Ony answer with the generated name:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Opalwolf, a gigantic rare wolf normal-type pokemon. It can be found in village-like environments It has the following abilities: hyper-fang. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word wolf or normal or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of normal-type pokemon, wolf-like, rare, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, soft ambient light
generatedDescription: Opalwolf is a gentle giant found patrolling village streets. Its Hyper-Fang strikes fear in foes. Protective & loyal to its home.
